message.body: Classes at Haverford in the morning, riding lessons until sun down. This is not a good week, it's hell week at Bryn mawr
Are you studying as we text?
Watching a movie about atapuerca, thinking about Portugal
Yea Lisbon. Christ! Why was I born in America? Pessoa was a god
I'm applying for a maritime field school there next summer, underwater archaeology.
Awesome
I am moving to Boston in aug. for 2 -4 years. Not as cool as Lisbon but at least it gets me away from here
Archeology, since when?
You need to get out of there.
Since I transferred, that's why I work in special collections
What are you doing? I neglected to ask earlier
Fuckin around on twitter, reading "an arsonists guide to writers homes in New England" by Brock Clarke ( horrible name) and finishing my laundry.
Nothing outrageous
Sounds like a Monday night.
Do you Instagram?
Nope. I tried, but it sucks. Twitter is the best.
I have never tried. Val just posted a picture of Steve and Townes in the bath tub. C'mon
Instagram seems so vainglorious even pallid in comparison to twitter and reddit
Lol
My example confirms your observation.
Even mark lol's
What about tonight?
Or tonight?
I just took a new job. Taxi cab driver
What about tonight? I don't understand.
Taxi driver, how iconic
Was just how you were rending your issues day to day. Yes. Good money surprisingly. I'm going to do it in Boston hopefully. Taxi driving and analysis.
They are basically the same thing, except one pays by the mile. My issues remain unresolved. I'm careful about decision making in the middle of winter. My head doesn't think straight.
Mmm I never want it to end, Hot tea is way better than iced tea
But cut off shorts are better than long underwear
Not from the standpoint of utility. But I get understand the whimsy.
Depends on the utility
Yea. My Chippewa boots and relaxed cut jeans are playing very well amongst my key female demographic , 27-35
Relaxed cut, just an easy going guy, ladies.
GGG
Just curious
Use them in the arena? Or solo?
I only buy them from a feminist shop in pdx tho
Yea the editors of our bodies ourselves have great suggestions
Depends what it is. Both.
I follow on twttr
This place has great stuff but always post unfortunate pictures of their smiling mannish looking customers on fb
Haha
Masc lesbians freak me out sometimes, like Hasidic Jews
Like "yewwwww"
Like its ok to stare.
Going to Bryn mawr has been a total overdose of lesbians. And of tolerance for others. I'm so tired of cultural tolerance
Today, as good orthodox Marxists, pre moderns, I think we have this same old problem called culture, in the world. How today, do we convince people that its silly?
It only serves to divide based on imaginary distinctions
I think the real sexual revolution had taken place, and out of it grew this "queer" culture which co opted all of its real potency and expressiveness.
Left us with guilds of sociopaths.
And lib dem orgs
